mapper.sql: gid, gname, storeid, applycar, unit, bigclassify, centreclassify, smallclassify, incomeid, vender, level, yieldiy, factoryname, coding, barcodes, specs, volume, netweight, suttle, hike, exchange, pricean, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5, remark6, remark7, remark8, remark9
mapper.select: SELECT storename,g.remark1,gid,gname,brandname,applycar,numbename,bigclassify,centreclassify,smallclassify,incomename,Originalname,placename,sitename,yieldiy,coding,barcodes,specs,volume,netweight,suttle,hike,exchange,pricename FROM goods AS g,store AS s,brand AS b,numbe AS n,price AS p,original AS o,incometype AS i,place AS pl,site AS si WHERE g.storeid=s.storeid AND g.unit=n.numbeid AND g.remark2=b.brandid AND g.pricean=p.priceid AND g.vender=o.Originalid AND g.incomeid=i.incomeid AND g.level=pl.placeid AND g.yieldiy=si.siteid

select
distinct
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goods (gid, gname, storeid, applycar, unit, bigclassify, centreclassify, smallclassify, incomeid, vender, level, yieldiy, factoryname, coding, barcodes, specs, volume, netweight, suttle, hike, exchange, pricean, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5, remark6, remark7, remark8, remark9) values (#{gid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applycar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigclassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{centreclassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallclassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yieldiy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barcodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suttle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hike,jdbcType=REAL}, #{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark9,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
